thread.title: Two years on, Brussels attack victims feel abandoned

title: Two years on, Brussels attack victims feel abandoned
text:
Two years on, Brussels attack victims feel abandoned Thursday, March 22, 2018 - 01:30 
The second anniversary of a militant attack in Belgium in which 32 people died brings back painful memories for Walter Benjamin, whose right leg was partially amputated because he was caught in a bomb blast at the airport. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The second anniversary of a militant attack in Belgium in which 32 people died brings back painful memories for Walter Benjamin, whose right leg was partially amputated because he was caught in a bomb blast at the airport.
